He’s been box-office since he joined the Premier League club, but unfortunately not much of that has related to actual football. arts.sum: Atlético Madrid could welcome a key member of the club’s backline back into the fray for their upcoming meeting with Sevilla. That’s according to Mundo Deportivo, who point towards Nahuel…
